transcript:
The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later.

Hello
Executive: Ji sir.
Hello
Executive: Ji sir. Haan ji Bharat bol raha hu sir India Mart head office se.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan bolo sir.
Customer: Ek buyer se matlab Saturday ko baat hua tha.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ye Jaipur ke hain.
Hmm hmm.
Executive: Call bhi kar diya sir maine aapko message bhi dala tha call you later mein call mein tha call mein.
Customer: Achcha achcha to ye India Mart inka jo hamara inquiry gaya tha India Mart ke through gaya tha ye dekhna hai ki inka India Mart se lead hai ya nahi hai India Mart se service le rakha hai ya nahi le rakha hai.
Executive: Kisne?
Customer: Ye Shiv Rudra ke naam se hai Shiv Rudra.
Executive: Mujhe batao main check karke batao.
Executive: Aapko batao.
Customer: Shiv Rudra.
Executive: Kya bataya?
Customer: Shiv Rudra WhatsApp pe likh WhatsApp pe likh ke do ek baar mere ko.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Call pe raho WhatsApp pe likho WhatsApp pe likh ke do ek baar.
Customer: Ek second haan haan.

Customer: Ye Jaipur ke hain.
Executive: Ek second.

Customer: Shiv Rudra.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek second.

Executive: Ye Shiv Rudra.
Executive: Kaha ka hai sir ye client kaha ka hai ye location kya hai iski?
Customer: Ye iska location hai Jaipur.
Executive: Jaipur hai kya Jaipur.
Executive: Kya company ka naam hai kya sir ye?
Customer: Ye owner naam hai owner.
Executive: Owner nahi company ka naam batao mujhe company ke naam se pata kare ya number bata do iska number hai.
Customer: 89
Executive: 89
Customer: 17
Executive: 17
Customer: 03
Executive: 03
Customer: 10
Executive: 10
Customer: 82
Executive: 82
Executive: Ye jo company hai high risk.
Executive: Kya hua isse baat hui thi kya aapki?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Kis cheez ke liye sir?
Customer: Ye base oil ke liye.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Base oil ke liye base oil.
Executive: Achcha achcha sir lekin sir ye kya kehte hai India Mart pe register nahi hai sir ye galat hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Aur iska hai na main batau aapko buyer supplier conflict iska already hai na kuch mode of payment theek hai isne fraud kar rakha hai sir already.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Haan haan buyer ke sath fraud kar rakha hai isne paise puse le leta hai ye uske baad jo hai ye product nahi pahuchata sir ye client jo hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: To kya baat vaat hui thi kya isse aapki?
Customer: Haan haan ye bata rahe the ki matlab hum India Mart se baat kar rahe hain ke through.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi isse deal mat karna sir fraud fraud hai ye.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Theek hai na kyuki agar main batau na iska iski complaint aa rakhi thi hamare paas do complaint aa rakhi thi iski already sir hamare paas theek hai to jiske karan isne complaint to resolve ki nahi maal pahuchaya nahi isne to iski company suspend kar di thi humne fir.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Theek hai na to isse deal vagarah mat karna fraud buyer hai ye koi fraud supplier hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Theek hai kya bol raha tha waise ye aapko?
Customer: Bata rahe the ki matlab mil jayega hum India Mart ke India Mart pe maine dekha hai to India Mart ke through aapse maine baat kiya to maine kaha.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Nahi nahi is isse deal mat karna sir bhul ke bhi na kyuki isne already fraud kar rakha hai sir theek hai kya pata dobara matlab fraud ho jaye sir aapke sath.
Customer: Aap se theek hai na pehle iski company thi agar main company ka naam batau na to iski company thi Jaipur trading company karke.
Executive: Theek hai iska naam tha Jaipur company Jaipur trading company.
Executive: To uske baad hai na sara website vagarah humne iska block kar diya.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Theek hai na.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To iske isse isse deal mat karna sir aap theek hai ye already jo hai fraud fraud ek supplier hai theek hai kisi dusre se kar lena sir dekh kar ke aur cross check kar lena jab deal karwao aap theek hai.
Customer: Theek theek.
Executive: Haan aur uska batao sir kya kuch karna hai uska ab to kafi time ho gaya sir ho gaya hoga budget ka arrange sir aapka.
Customer: To ye fraud pe kaam kar rahe hain.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Ye inka fraud ka kaam hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi are sir is company pe tumko batau is company se deal mat karna aap theek hai na.
Customer: Inka inka is pe register ye nahi hai India Mart pe koi.
Executive: Na na India Mart pe register tha but inka service deactivate kar diya gaya kyuki fraud fraud kiya tha inhone ye bol raha hu aapko theek hai na.
Customer: Shiv Rudra se deal mat karna.
Customer: Inse baat hua tha to inka rate to samajh mein aaya tha.
Executive: Hmm to sir fraud banda hai na ye kyu paise laga rahe ho bina baat ke bata diya aapko jab fraud hai ye pehle bhi do teen buyer ke paise kha ke baitha hai sir ye.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Theek hai na aapka bhi paisa fas jayega fir deal karoge to abhi maine bata diya aapko ki fraud hai ye kyuki isne do buyer ke paise khaye the company ne bola luta do uske paise paise bhi nahi lutaye isne.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Theek hai na to maine kaha ek baar inse clear kar le fir uske baad mein dekhe to baat jalti hai sir rate to is baar aapki clear ho gaya tha lekin yahi sawal hai mention hua ki aisa hai ki inka rate to sahi yada kyuki fraud ka hai to bhai do rupya mahanga koi to fan karega lekin sasta to main bata raha hu na aapko fraud banda hai sir ye isse deal mat karna ab.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai na dikkat ho jayegi fir.
Executive: Theek hai aur apna batao sir service ka kaise kya kuch karna hai.
Customer: Nahi karwa denge ab ye thoda sa isi ke chakkar mein the ki aisa ab to bahut time ho gaya dekho ji aap to ek do do teen tarikh tak bol rahe the ab to bahut time ho gaya karwao isko aisa nahi baat ye hua ki jo India Mart ke through dekh rahe hain jo matlab base oil ke liye to uske liye jo recording hum dekhte to jo matlab jo rate main dekhta hu India Mart ke through to uske recording buyer se baat hi nahi ho pa rahi hai.
Executive: To sir wo to hum direct karwa denge aapki baat uski kyu tension le rahe ho maal lena hai na aapko maal ke liye to hum direct baat karwa denge uski kyu tension le rahe ho uski tension mat lo maal vagarah to hum karwa denge adjustment aapka direct baat karwa ke theek hai uska karwao aap isi ke liye fees raha fir hamara bhi ye dekho India Mart ka hi 45 150 ka 45 rate aa raha hai.
Executive: Wo to theek hai sir wo to karwa denge maine bataya na aapko wo karwa denge aap requirement post karwa denge aapke yahan se aapke account se theek hai buyer supplier apne aap connect kar lenge aapko.
Customer: Main cheez to wahi to baat hai ki aisa hai direct buyer jab tak aayega nahi hum kar hi nahi payenge main cheez to baat ye hai.
Executive: Buyer to aayega na aap maal ki baat kar rahe ho na maal ki baat kar rahe ho na aap maal aapko kharidna hai kya?
Customer: Ji ji to uske hisab se recording se baat hi nahi ho pa rahi kisi buyer se nahi baat ho rahi ho pa rahi hai hamari.
Executive: Aapko buyer se baat karna hai supplier se baat karna hai pehle to ye batao sir.
Customer: Nahi aapko maal chahiye ya maal bechna hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi ji jo base oil mujhe chahiye.
Executive: Chahiye hai na aapko to supplier dhundhoge na buyer thodi dhundhoge sir aap aap to supplier dhundhoge.
Customer: To uski recording aati hi nahi ho pa rahi hai.
Executive: To aapka wo to main requirement post karwa dunga aapka theek hai to wahi to main cheez hai sara cheez clear ho gaya hai lekin jab tak hum lagaenge nahi tab tak hamara hoga bhi nahi.
Executive: To aapke paas production nahi hai kya abhi?
Customer: Nahi to nahi hai.
Executive: To aapki wo ek kaam karo usme jo hai buyer ki na requirement jo hai dalne ka aapko main bata deta hu kaise dalna hai apna app open karo India Mart ka.
Customer: Haan open hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji open karne ke baad hai na left mein sabse upar teen line hai hai na ulti hath ki taraf.
Executive: Teen line hai teen line pe click karo hmm haan yahan pe niche scroll karo aapko post your requirement dikhai dega post your requirement karke.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dikhai diya hmm hmm yahan pe apna requirement dal do jo bhi aapko product chahiye wo dal do iske andar theek hai aapko jo hai jaise hi aap ye form fill karoge aapka requirement jo hai India Mart pe post ho jayega aur supplier apne aap aapko connect kar lenge khud ba khud sir theek hai na samajh mein aaya ji aur koi dikkat aati hai iske regarding sir theek hai to mujhse directly directly jo rate ke regarding baat nahi ho pa rahi phone to aa rahe lekin rate ke regarding nahi baat ho pa rahi koi baat nahi wo to karwa denge deal close karwa denge sir aapke uske tension mat lo hum karwa denge hmm wahi hai na abhi dekho aapke sath fraud ho jata abhi bacha liya na aapko sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi to jaise ek baar fraud hua to baar baar fraud hoga fir ji hmm acha dekho maine dekho aapko bata diya dekho maine to aapko bata diya ab aapki marzi hai sir aapko deal karna hai to aap kar lo dekho lekin maine to bata diya ki isne fraud kiya hua hai pehle theek hai wo aapki marzi hai sir ab jo aapne pucha hai wo maine bata diya dekho theek hai na jaise status hai ab mujhe thodi pata hai sir wo fraud karega ya fir nahi karega maine to uski history bata di jaise history thi hmm sahi baat sahi hai theek hai na haan to wahi cheez hai sir dekho aur ek hai na ek baar ye post karo requirement theek hai uske baad mujhe batana koi help ki jarurat ho to mere se connect kar lena theek hai aur ek mera hai na sir feedback aayega feedback jarur se kar dena sir ek positive theek hai theek theek theek ok ok theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to verify a buyer's IndiaMART subscription.

- Unable to connect with buyers for base oil.

- Facing issues with recording of buyer details.


Resolution:

- Executive checked and confirmed buyer is a fraud.

- Executive advised not to deal with the buyer.

- Executive offered to post requirement on IndiaMART.

- Executive explained how to post requirements on app.


Next Steps: 

- Customer will post requirement on IndiaMART.

- Customer will provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, buyer verification, base oil, requirements
